snippet: McLaren says its sophisticated simulation system could radically improve the speed and efficiency of developing ordinary passenger cars.
abstract: Wheels column; British firm McLaren is marketing digital simulator invented for its Formula One cars to mainstream carmakers; technology makes comparing performance of car components easier than in real-world testing; company says system could greatly improve speed and efficiency of developing cars.
lead_paragraph: McLaren says its sophisticated simulation system could radically improve the speed and efficiency of developing ordinary passenger cars.

headline.print_headline: Formula One Development Tool, Now for the Family Sedan
headline.main: Formula One Development Tool Now at Hand for the Family Sedan
